title: London/City of London
name: Spitalfields Market
alt: Just outside the City and owned by the City of London Corporation
content: Once a large thriving market, it has slowly been shrunk to a third of its size by development in the area. It features a good variety of clothing, crafts and food stalls/shops. Rather promisingly sellers have set up another market in a new space off Hanbury St nearby. | image=Spitalfields Market Horner Buildings - geograph.org.uk - 320580.jpg
